sent.orig: Never trouble yourself with trouble till trouble troubles you.
Never trouble trouble until trouble troubles you.
sent.trans: 麻烦没来找你，别去自找麻烦。

sent.orig: I hope you don't trouble trouble until trouble troubles you!
sent.trans: 我希望你不要到问题困扰你时你时才担心问题。

sent.orig: Never trouble trouble till trouble troubles you.
sent.trans: 麻烦没来找你，就别去自找麻烦。

sent.orig: Don't trouble trouble till trouble troubles you.
sent.trans: 麻烦没有来找你，不要去找麻烦。
